website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive 12-ounce hammer takes care of most jobs around the home. Pink handle is easy to see.
pros: Grip is comfortable to use for long hammering sessions
Head of hammer has a magnetic nail holder
Pink color on the handle of the hammer makes it easy to see in dark conditions or to identify as yours
Surprisingly sturdy construction quality considering the price

customer_reviews.title: Works great for nailing and removing nails
customer_reviews.text: My husband called this a "girls hammer". I told him to close his eyes and I would hit him with a "girls hammer" and a "boys hammer" and see if he could tell the difference.😀 This was part of a toolbox I put together for myself. Just the basics to be able to hang pictures, tighten screws, put together small appliances etc. Works great for nailing and removing nails.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy O

customer_reviews.title: Finally a real size hammer in pink!
customer_reviews.text: My husband won't touch my pink tools, so I always know where they are. And this is the perfect weight for a woman who has indoor or outdoor chores to do. Other pink hammers that come in women's tool kits are small. This one is a real hammer. Not the biggest size but same as some of my guys other hammers. I can build stuff and pull large nails with it. Keeper!
customer_reviews.author: JoJo99

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I find some hammers are too light to drive in some nails. This is perfect! And because of it's color, my gentlemen friends will probably refrain from "borrowing" it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Fondrin

customer_reviews.title: I deserve this!
customer_reviews.text: Actually would have liked it thirty years ago when we were building a house. I'm going to use it to hammer flowers on to paper. I think I will enjoy sitting outside, enjoying my flowers, and making some art work. I'll make sure I will have a hammer, board and paper for any grandchild that wants to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Turquoise Fan

customer_reviews.title: Finally can find my hammer!
customer_reviews.text: Love my pink hammer. Solid, gets the job done, good weight. In a house full of boys (husband included) it's nice to always know where my hammer is. Got it for an awesome price, as well!
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Great for lightweight use.
customer_reviews.text: Good for lightweight , everyday chores but I'd be afraid to use the hammer for big jobs outdors for an extended amount of time (months, years) Works like others but should get put back in the right place if used by a person who stays organized.
customer_reviews.author: My Ama

customer_reviews.title: My mother loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dad is a real handy man, so whenever he finds a tool, it ends up outside in the garage. My mom just wanted HER OWN hammer. So I randomly bought her one and she loves it. It's not super heavy duty, but it isn't light duty like everyone else says. I would pick this hammer to drive spikes.
customer_reviews.author: brodudeman

customer_reviews.title: love!
customer_reviews.text: My smaller hammer disappeared when my son got his own tool box -- hmmm. It is substantial and has a nice wait. Just the right size for what I need it for. I smile every time I reach for this little pink beauty! I am considering adding the pink screwdriver set to my tool box as well, just because!
customer_reviews.author: BiziMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice grip
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hammer for my odd jobs around the house.I won't use my husband's tools because I can't ever seem to find what I want in close range.I lIke that this has a nice solid grip,and it's a tad bit on the heavy side.The colors nice but that's not why I chose this.All around its a great functional solid hammer.
customer_reviews.author: KTop Contributor: Cake Decorating

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THE DARK PINK!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE DARK PINK! This hammer can match any regular "man's" hammer BANG per BANG! Glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Maryland JP

customer_reviews.title: Original Pink Box Hamer
customer_reviews.text: A Xmas gift for my daughter who is moving into her very own first home. She'll be using this for hanging pictures and many other repairs, I'm sure. She loves the pink color which identifies it as hers. If it up and "walks away" with someone, she should be able to locate it easier than just any ol' hammer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hammer. Great give for the girlfriend in need
customer_reviews.text: Very nice hammer. Great give for the girlfriend in need.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Chulada

customer_reviews.title: Works like a hammer
customer_reviews.text: Great price (Got it for less than $7 as an add on) and everyone knows it is mine and if they walk off with it or lose it, I will hammer their toes to my front door ;-) Everyone kept saying their hammers went missing so I figured if I got a pink one then we all knew who it belonged to!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Muczynski

customer_reviews.title: It's a pink hammer
customer_reviews.text: What can I say! It's a pink hammer. Was Christmas gift for the wife and she loved it. Now if I can just find a pink lawn mower!
customer_reviews.author: Termite

customer_reviews.title: We can do it too, Pink!
customer_reviews.text: Regular hammer, but the hammer is 10 times better for women because it's so cute and pink! Love the extra grip, easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.author: City Girl Charlii

customer_reviews.title: Original Pink Box Hammer
customer_reviews.text: I really love my new hammer. No one can say they don’t have it, especially if I find it in a toolbox that’s not mine
customer_reviews.author: carolyn b.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a good hammer for someone with smaller hands. It's only 12oz so it's not too heavy however, it has a good size head on it and can be used for household repair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice item for use at home
customer_reviews.text: 11 ounce hammer was great for my wife to use versus my 16 oz. The pink color made her feel greater ownership. It is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Schlaegel

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: it's my "junk drawer" hammer for use inside the house such as hanging pictures. strong enough , but lightweight enough to be a "quick" go to for a little project.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a birthday gift this year and I absolutely love it! I have had multiple hammers in the past and they were either too heavy or fall apart/break. This one is extremely sturdy not to mention super cute while I’m woodworking! I would definitely buy this again in a heartbeat! All of the tools from the original pink box are absolutely Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice weight and easy to use!!
customer_reviews.text: Loading up the mommy box! Nice size for those small jobs! #do touch - replace if used!
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: Hammer away!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for a woman's tool box... not flimsy like some of the ones in the prepackaged tool kits for women. Must have for all the ladies in your life!!
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Cute and it works ;)
customer_reviews.text: Love my girlie pink hammer! My hubby has teased me for years that I "stole" his ugly old hammer. I taunted him and told him he'd said it enough and I was buying myself a "girl" hammer. I did. I love it! I've built/repaired many things with that ugly old red hammer but this one makes me smile with every new project :)
customer_reviews.author: OP

customer_reviews.title: Nice for light use around the house
customer_reviews.text: Needing a few extra tools after Harvey, this was a great option for my wife. She now has several Pink Box tools and loves them. Not a heavy duty hammer but more than enough for what she needs to do.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Refuse to let my fiancee borrow it.
customer_reviews.text: Refuse to let my fiancee borrow it. Its not light in the ass. Has some weight to it, very lady like; but packs a punch.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy7799

customer_reviews.title: A hammer I can actually use - YEAH!
customer_reviews.text: A hammer I can actually use - YEAH! I had three hammers in the house, all 18 oz or heavier. They all hurt my wrist and arms to use. Then I saw this as a $7 add-on, and I had a diy project looming, so in the cart it went.
customer_reviews.author: zdamaw

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This hammer is more light weight then most. Seems like it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: kaylan

customer_reviews.title: Not too girly
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the description better, this is larger and heavier then I expected. Very sturdy and well made! And I LOVE the color. Perfect for when my dad comes over and we have to say "is this your hammer or mine?"
customer_reviews.author: A. K. Whitman

customer_reviews.title: It's a Hammer
customer_reviews.text: Great hammer, I mean, it's a hammer. Love the pink color, makes it easy to locate in our tool box under the sink.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer! But...
customer_reviews.text: Great hammer! Just don't leave it lying around where your chew-happy dog can get to it. The pretty handle looked too much like one of her favorite toys. On the plus side, it still works with a few layers of duct tape on the handle to cover up the mauled end.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Smith

customer_reviews.title: This piece of hammer works great when we go camping
customer_reviews.text: This piece of hammer works great when we go camping. It is so much easy to push and pull out the pins from the ground. It is light weight and pretty small. Easy to carry and store. Well its does its common jobs well too.
customer_reviews.author: Pratyaydipta R.

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hammer. Good heavy duty quality. I like everything pink and I thought it was going to be girly, but to my surprise, it was nice and sturdy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tip

customer_reviews.title: A real hammer for getting things done. The shorter ...
customer_reviews.text: A real hammer for getting things done. The shorter handle coupled with the 20oz. head is easier for me to use than some other longer handled ones I've tried. High quality + pink = zero complaints or regrets.
customer_reviews.author: ty

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's girlie & lightweight.. wont get lost now
customer_reviews.text: I needed my own hammer bc hubbies is heavy, etc. Good price, weight & love the color
customer_reviews.author: sandra r

customer_reviews.title: My tools Hands off
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as a regular hammer bit it does match all my other tools
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Original Pink products are my favorites
customer_reviews.text: I like the hammer. It is the perfect weight for me. Just like my other pink tools and accessories, now I dont have to worry about the extra tuff klepto guys that like to steal and pawn my tools! Apparently pink is not their color!
customer_reviews.author: dawgpaula

customer_reviews.title: The metal head is clearly glued on - there's a ...
customer_reviews.text: The metal head is clearly glued on - there's a thick ring of dried glue where it meets the plastic. It works to hang pictures though, which is all I need it for!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Mank

customer_reviews.title: Pink Hammer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my husband kept accusing me of miss placing his tools. So I decided I'm going to have my own tools that are my favor color so he can't accuse me of miss placing his tools because I have my own and they are different color and he is not allowed to use them so he can't miss place them. This product so far is serving me very well!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer!  And keeps my husband from using it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is not just pretty, it is functional. Just like a blue or black manly hammer you’d find in one of those dark, dingy, stinky hardware stores. And best of all, MY HUSBAND WON’T USE IT!!!! HA!!
customer_reviews.author: TLL

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves all things pink and loves building and making things so this is the perfect addition to her growing assortment of tools. She also received the original pink three drawer toolbox which she loves
customer_reviews.author: Grammy Pam

customer_reviews.title: Love it ! Will order from them more ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this hammer . I can't wait to start make some pinkalicious crafts lol. Good to know they have lifetime warranty .. Will be ordering their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: PINK
customer_reviews.text: Unique tools for a unique misses.... seems to be quality-made if you can ignore the head just being glue to the handle and the glue oozing out the side. Until it breaks, its just a minor aesthetic folly. Suits exactly what I needed it for. DANKE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pink is where it is at
customer_reviews.text: good weight for me, a 65 yr old woman, love the color, seems to be a good hammer, will tell better when have to use it
customer_reviews.author: lannalyn

customer_reviews.title: What I needed..
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight to swing, feels good in my small hand. And I can find it when I put it down;-) .
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: I had decided to build my own tool box with ...
customer_reviews.text: I had decided to build my own tool box with these pink tools and they are just the right size and weight for my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Ikea furniture
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted a pink hammer. We went to the store to checkout the weight of different hammer but did not see "pink hammer". We received this just in time so we can use it to put together the Ikea furnitures we purchased. It is the right size and the right weight. Good quality also.
customer_reviews.author: CA-1

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved it. A little heavy though. More a framing hammer than daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Hipp

customer_reviews.title: This one was cheap and I like the color
customer_reviews.text: Well, a hammer is a hammer. This one was cheap and I like the color. Of course it works... it's a hammer! But the grip is nice and if you're going to own hardware like this, it may as well be fun to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for girly girls who can fix sh***! I love it!!!

customer_reviews.title: but i love the pink
customer_reviews.text: its a hammer! what do u want me to say? it really puts the nail to the wall! but i love the pink!

customer_reviews.title: Pink Box Claw Hammer
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I take a little ribbing when I pull my pink hammer out of my toolbox, but hey, it was the best value I could find in a utility hammer. Very pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Longhorn7175

customer_reviews.title: Great hammer
customer_reviews.text: The order came quickly and it is exactly what I wanted. I put it in my daughter's college dorm kit.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Marie

customer_reviews.title: Pink is not just for girls!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Pink Box tool box for myself and decided it should be filled with as much pink as possible. This is a great hammer, not too heavy, but it has enough weight to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hilderbrand

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Was exactly as described and arrived on time. Hammer works well for doing little things around the barn and no one else says it's ver hammer because now mine is pink.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent work to gloves
customer_reviews.text: Excellent work to gloves. The Original Pink Box merchandise is awesome quality and great for the making of a she shed!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mixed feelings in the house about the color. It's also very lightweight. Only for light household use.

customer_reviews.title: How can you not love a pink hammer to help you with tasks around ...
customer_reviews.text: How can you not love a pink hammer to help you with tasks around the house? Been using it to build IKEA furniture as of later and it's worked perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: new hammer
customer_reviews.text: lost my favorite hammer this is a replacement had 20oz straight claw(for roofing) but that was 45yrs ago. so i decided to try something lighter. we got a new cabinet in kitchen and carpender borrowed this laughed at color but did great job.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kiger

customer_reviews.title: perfect weight and balance for an old lady
customer_reviews.text: This hammer is perfectly balanced for me. I am very glad I decided on it. I am unsure of the construction. It appears to be a head attached to a handle--not ideal, but for the price it is all good. If it isn't stolen, it will likely outlast me. :) It is not magnetic.
customer_reviews.author: jsue

customer_reviews.title: For my own set of tools for hanging pictures. ...
customer_reviews.text: For my own set of tools for hanging pictures. Now I don't have to go hunt down my husbands tools.

customer_reviews.title: Modern, stylish tool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hammer to assemble my Walmart shelf after I broke a plastic connector while trying to hammer it in using a steamer. It is very cute and sleek for a hammer. I look forward to using it for future home improvement projects! The pink color makes it easy to find within the disaster that is my room.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute and sturdy! Gets the job done is style, what more can I say?

customer_reviews.title: Lady's Hammer!

product_meta.title: The Original Pink Box PB20HM Rip Claw Hammer with Magnetic Nail Holder, 20 oz, Pink
product_meta.description: Style:20oz Rip Hammer20 ounce head with a rip claw. The durable fiberglass core reduces vibrations better than steel handles. Magnetic nail holder assists in setting and driving nails.
feature_bullets: You'll always know which hammer is yours with this unique coloring
Easy grip handle adds comfort and style
Fiberglass core handle with resin coating

specifications.Included Components: Rip Claw Hammer with Magnetic Nail Holder, 20 oz., Pink
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars382 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
